revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WDR7500 |revision=v2.x |series=AC1750 |asin= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=Q64-104HIP |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162GFR-Y5C |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880;QCA9880-AR1A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N;AR8327N-AL1A; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=0C:72:2C |oui_eth=0C:72:2C }} {{TagLine|AC1750 Wireless Gigabit Router}}
*[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=41682 ''TP-LINK TL-WDR7500'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] Per the below photos.. (this is a v2.0 unit) the device is using.. *CPU: QCA9558 (QCA9558-AT4A) 3x3 abgn (bgn, in this instance) WiSoC *Flash: ''Eon'' Q64-104HIP (EN25Q64-104HIP) - 8MB SPI flash *RAM: 2x ''Hynix'' H5PS5162GFR-Y5C - 64MB DDR2 SDRAM (128MB total) *WLAN: QCA9880 (QCA9880-AR1A, appears to be QCA9880v1) 3x3 an/ac PCIe *SW: AR8327N (AR8327N-AL1A) GbE switch (w/ hardware NAT) this may be a China specific version as it looks a bit different from :the stock photos provided by ''TP-LINK'' *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces-2013/31993-tp-link-ces-2013-announcements ''Announced at CES 2013'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (v1?)
==Images== <gallery caption="again, unsourced images, presumably from mydigit.net"> <!-- contact me if you want the images removed, btw --> Image:TL-WDR7500 11.jpg|Top Image:TL-WDR7500 10.jpg|CPU, WiSoC Image:TL-WDR7500 9.jpg| WLAN, 5GHz Image:TL-WDR7500 4.jpg|Switch Image:TL-WDR7500 6.jpg|WiSoC, 2.4GHz Image:TL-WDR7500 2.jpg|WiSoC, FEM Image:TL-WDR7500 3.jpg|CPU, RAM Image:TL-WDR7500 8.jpg|5GHz Module Image:TL-WDR7500 1.jpg|Case Image:TL-WDR7500 7.jpg|Ports Image:TL-WDR7500 5.jpg|Label </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::internal| ]]
